description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nMetaphor:
After an enemy takes damage from {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_POISON}, {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BURNED}, or {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BLIGHT}, your creatures recover {STAT_health} equal to 35% of the damage dealt. This trait does not stack.
name: Soothsayer Scalpel
